body:
I don't understand what "In particular" is trying to indicate here.  It seems like these are two separate ideas:
1) It only accepts floating point dtypes
2) It only casts floating pointer parameters to the argument

"2)" doesn't necessarily follow from "1)", so "in particular" doesn't seem correct.  "In addition"?
